dashboard.delete_prompt: Do you really want to delete all results?
dashboard.json_prompt: Enter the JSON to be saved.
dashboard.sort_desc: Order results from the oldest to the most resent
dashboard.sort_asc: Order results from the most resent to the oldest
dashboard.welcome_text1: Before you start using this tool, you have to enter the authentication token assigned to you by the administrator. The token can be entered below. It can be changed at any time in the settings.
dashboard.welcome_text2: The sent requests together with the token are recorded by the server. No other data is collected by the tool. By closing this window you agree to this.

settings.token_comment: Enter authentication token assigned to you by the administrator.
settings.persistent_comment: Token will be available even after browser restart.
settings.wipe_comment: This will delete all settings and all search results
settings.wipe_prompt: Do you really want to wipe all settings and all results?
settings.default_settings_comment: Clears all settings search results will be preserved
settings.default_settings_prompt: Do you really want to delete all settings? Search results will be preserved.

admin.put_group_comment: Add a token service group to the tokens file. In field 1, enter the group name (e.g. org1), in field 2 enter the service IDs separated by commas (e.g. 0, 1, 3, 5).
admin.put_user_comment: Add user to the tokens file. Enter the user's token into field 1, enter the service IDs or group names that the user should have access into field 2 (e.g. org1, 2, 6, 8).
admin.put_superuser_comment: Add a super user to the tokens file. Enter the super user token into field 1, leave field 2 empty.
admin.put_admin_comment: Add admin to the tokens file. Enter the admin token into field 1, leave field 2 empty.
admin.services_list_comment: This field is only applicable when adding users and groups. Values are separated by a comma.
admin.del_group_comment: Into the field 3, type the name of the group that should be deleted.
admin.del_user_comment: Into the field 3, type the token of the user that should be deleted.
admin.del_superuser_comment: Into the field 3, type the token of the super user that should be deleted.
admin.del_admin_comment: Into the field 3, type the token of the admin that should be deleted.

error.not_found_description: The page you are looking does not exist (Error code 404).
error.fetch_fetch_groups: Error occurred while requesting available groups of services.
error.fetch_fetch_services: Error occurred while requesting available services.
error.token_comment: You have to enter your token first. Go to settings.
error.detect: You have to specify request type first.
error.detect_comment: Request could not be sent because you have not specified service or group of services to which request should be sent.
